ai-patthana21.4:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana21.4:1.1_0: Not because of cause or reason, the reason for the sake of skillful teaching, not for the sake of cause or reason.
ai-patthana21.4:2.1_0: Not for the sake of knowing and seeing the cause or condition for the sake of unskillful.
ai-patthana21.4:3.1_0: No cause has not been declared by the reason for this.
ai-patthana21.4:3.1_1: (This is the same as the previous discourse.)
